txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Scarred heartwood from the twisted creatures of nature in the swamp south of Agamaur. Bring them to Elsa the Bold at the Eglain-camp in Agamaur.
'We will give all of these to Radagast to determine if there is hope for any of these poor creatures.\n\n'Thank you.'
'The heartwood of the befouled creatures of nature must be collected and opened to see if the seed within can be saved.'
Elsa the Bold, at the Eglain-camp in Agamaur, desires scarred heartwood from the twisted creatures of nature found in the swamp south of Agamaur.
Deliver the scarred heartwood to Elsa the Bold at the Eglain-camp at Agamaur
You accepted a task from Elsa the Bold to acquire scarred heartwood from the creatures of nature within the swamp south of Agamaur. You can find Elsa the Bold within the Eglain-camp in Agamaur.
Wanted: Scarred heartwood from the twisted creatures of nature in the swamp south of Agamaur.
